import React from "react" function Post (props) { function like () { setLikeAmount ( likeAmount + 1) likeClass = props.likeAmount ? "":"heart-filled" likeIcon = props.likeAmount ? "heart-outline":"heart" } const [likeAmount, setLikeAmount] = React.useState(props.likeAmount) let likeClass = "" let likeIcon = "heart-outline" return (
{props.user}
Curtido por {props.userLike} e outras {likeAmount} pessoas
) } export default Post
